crazyballrun.game.level

Class LevelParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
      • crazyballrun.game.level.LevelParser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.xml.sax.ContentHandler, org.xml.sax.DTDHandler, org.xml.sax.EntityResolver, org.xml.sax.ErrorHandler

    public class LevelParser
extends org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
    The LevelParser parses an XML-file which specifies level-specific data (map texturing, objects on the map, player positions, goals, etc.). For loading objects, sounds and textures, the LevelParser first tries to find them in the Level/Music/Graphics-Engine. If they do not exist there it will search in the local level path.
